name.baseName: Exploration potential analysis ; Marine source rock ; Organic geochemical analysis
勘探潜力分析; 海相烃源岩 ;有机地球化学分析

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: Eight outcrop sections are selected to systematically analyze the organic geochemistry of 8 sets of marine source rocks in northwestern Sichuan, including Doushantuo Formation of Lower Sinian, Dengsan Formation of Upper Sinian, Qiongzhusi Formation of Lower Cambrian, Longmaxi Formation of Lower Silurian, Middle Devonian, Maokou Formation of Middle Permian, Longtan Formation/Wujiaping Formation of Upper Permian and Dalong Formation, and discuss the natural gas exploration potential in this area.
选取8条露头剖面对川西北地区下震旦统陡山沱组、上震 旦统灯三段、下寒武统筇竹寺组、下志留统龙马溪组、中泥盆统、中二叠统茅口组、上二叠统龙潭 组/吴家坪组和大隆组8套海相烃源岩进行了系统的有机地球化学分析，探讨了该区天然气勘探潜 力。

time.common:timeRepresentativenessDescription: Since the 1940s, natural gas exploration in northwest Sichuan has continued
自20世纪40年代至今，川西北地区天然气 勘探持续不断

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: Based on the analysis data of the thickness and organic carbon of the source rocks, the total gas generation intensity of 8 sets of source rocks in Northwest Sichuan is evaluated
基于上述烃源岩厚度和有机碳的分析数据，对 川西北地区8套烃源岩总生气强度进行了评价
technology.technologicalApplicability: The geochemical analysis data set from the marine source rocks in northwestern Sichuan is intended for use by geological and geochemical researchers as well as the energy industry to evaluate the natural gas exploration potential. It includes assessments of organic matter abundance, type, and maturity within different geological formations, which can be used to identify areas with higher quality source rocks characterized by large thickness and wide distribution, and therefore indicate promising regions for future natural gas exploration and extraction activities.
四川盆地北西部海相烃源岩的有机地球化学分析数据集是为地质和地球化学研究人员以及能源行业设计的，用于评估天然气勘探潜力。该数据包括对不同地质构造中有机质丰度、类型及成熟度的评估，可用于识别具有较大厚度和广泛分布的高质量烃源岩区域，为未来天然气勘探和开采活动指示有前景的区域。

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.dataSelectionAndCombinationPrinciples: Abundance, type and maturity of organic matter in source rocks
烃源岩有机质丰度 、烃源岩有机质类型 、烃源岩有机质成熟度
dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.dataTreatmentAndExtrapolationsPrinciples: According to the analysis of geochemistry and vertical and horizontal thickness distribution of each set of source rocks in Northwest Sichuan, high-quality source rocks with high organic matter abundance are developed in the Lower Cambrian Qiongzhusi Formation, Upper Permian Longtan Formation and Dalong Formation, which are characterized by large thickness and wide distribution.
通过对川西北地区各套烃源岩地球化学及烃 源岩纵横向厚度展布分析，下寒武统筇竹寺组、上 二叠统龙潭组和大隆组发育高有机质丰度的优质 烃源岩，并且具有厚度大、分布广特征征，

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: 胡国艺;贺飞;米敬奎;袁懿琳;郭谨豪; 川西北地区海相烃源岩地球化学特征、分布规律及天然气勘探潜力. 天然气地球科学 319–333 (2021).
胡国艺;贺飞;米敬奎;袁懿琳;郭谨豪; 川西北地区海相烃源岩地球化学特征、分布规律及天然气勘探潜力. 天然气地球科学 319–333 (2021).

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: Users of this data set should consider the regional geological context when interpreting the organic geochemical analyses. The data is specifically applicable to the northwestern Sichuan region, and should not be extrapolated to other areas without further geospatial analysis. Users should account for the methodological approach used in the data collection, including the selection of outcrop sections and the techniques applied for determining organic matter characteristics. It is essential that users integrate this data with geological and geophysical data to derive robust conclusions on natural gas potential.
使用此数据集的用户在解释有机地球化学分析时应考虑区域地质背景。该数据特别适用于四川盆地西北部地区，未经进一步地理空间分析不应外推至其他区域。用户应考虑数据收集中使用的方法论，包括露头剖面的选择以及确定有机质特征的技术。用户必须将此数据与地质和地球物理数据整合以得出关于天然气潜力的可靠结论。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

exchange.generalComment: 等效镜质体反射率，范围取均值
